tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: I see a warning sign with a number 3 below it, on Feb 28th at the 9 hs candle. We should take a look and see what it is about!

paragraphs.text: The number 3 means there are 3 warnings at the same time. In case you forgot, this is what you need to do:
Pull the slider up to the middle of the screen or higher and put the pointer of the mouse on the tiny warning sign or the candle in which the warning happens.
Now go and track the warnings in the design space using the map feature to find them!
